scripts.build: cd emul && verilator -Wno-fatal -I../rtl --cc $npm_package_config_verilog_top.v --trace --exe ../$npm_package_config_cpp  -Mdir build -CFLAGS "-g -O3" && make -C build -f V$npm_package_config_verilog_top.mk
scripts.run: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build && cd emul/build && ./V$npm_package_config_verilog_top
